api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fastmoney.p.rapidapi.comwww.fastmoney.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastmoney.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://fastmoney.p.rapidapi.comwww.fastmoney.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastmoney.p.rapidapi.com"
